scripts.pkg-copy: cp smol-auth-core/package.json lib/smol-auth-core && cp smol-auth-core/README.md lib/smol-auth-core && cp smol-auth-express/package.json lib/smol-auth-express && cp smol-auth-express/README.md lib/smol-auth-express && cp smol-auth-express/types.d.ts lib/smol-auth-express && cp smol-auth-client/package.json lib/smol-auth-client && cp smol-auth-client/README.md lib/smol-auth-client && cp smol-auth-client/types.d.ts lib/smol-auth-client
scripts.pkg-install: cd lib/smol-auth-core && pnpm install --prod && npm link && cd ../smol-auth-express && pnpm install --prod && npm link && cd ../smol-auth-client && npm link
scripts.start-example:api: cd api-example && npm install && npm link smol-auth-core && npm link smol-auth-express && concurrently "npm run docker:start" "npm run dev"
scripts.start-example:client: cd client-example && npm install && npm link smol-auth-client && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd smol-auth-core && pnpm install && cd ../smol-auth-express && pnpm install
